com.gmail.dengtao.joe.transport.filter
Interface Filter

All Known Implementing Classes:
FilterAdapter, TailFilter
public interface Filter

A filter which intercepts Handler events like Servlet filters. Filters can be used for these purposes:

  • Event logging,
  • Performance measurement,
  • Authorization,
  • Overload control,
  • Message transformation (e.g. encryption and decryption, ...),
  • and many more.

You can implement your filters to filter message you recived.

The Life Cycle

Filters are activated only when they are inside FilterChain.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
DengTao
